title: How do I change back to using Firefox as my default browser?
content: How to select Firefox as my default browser? I was tricked into selecting Google Chrome in order to use the NSW Planning Portal. I want return to Firefox!
creator: tapplet

title: Icons appear for sites I have no interest in.  Hos do I delete them??
content: Tell me how to change the Icons that appear when I boot Firefox. I have no interest in the connections featured.
creator: ken35

title: How would I change this colour?
content:
I'm trying to add translucence to the hover effect on the new tab page, but I can't seem to select it from css.

Currently Ive tried adding this in usercontent

html:root[lwt-newtab-brighttext] { 

 --newtab-background-color: #2B2A3366;

}
creator: ltks

title: Capital One site is not working with the updated Firefox
content: Since I installed the new updates from Firefox, Capital One is no longer working. I cannot log into the website. Is there something I can do to address the problem? I only want to use Firefox especially for all online banking.
creator: 1230rides
